name: Vega Sport
description: VEGA SPORT is a decentralized sports project built and developed on blockchain to meet the demand and general trend of users in new age technology . VEGA Sport builds products and services with outstanding new features , applying blockchain technology to the sports field . OUR FEATURES Community of sports lovers ( VEGA DAO ) This is where we share knowledge about our favourite sports , where to participate in competitions to show talent in sports and predict sports . Decentralized sports betting platform Decentralized sports betting platform with updated odds every 3 seconds for users . All odds and betting values are operated by smart contracts on the blockchain for public transparency and no one can interfere . The process of processing bets is automatic and fastest on the blockchain . Building and developing intellectual sports for the community like Chess , Esports , and Poker by decentralizing tournaments for users around the world . All are run by smart contracts on the blockchain to be publicly watched by people all over the world . NFT Marketplace exchange , where the community can exchange , buy and sell NFT sports items , where favourite athletes and football players can give valuable sports items value to their fans , or it can also be a place to create value for items to contribute to the community .
